attributes.action: Draught in the army to help with food delivery to supermarkets and vulnerable
attributes.additional_details: it would also be helpful if food delivery by the army is extended to the elderly and vulnerable households who have a disabled person in residence this could be done for anyone who receives a qualifying disability benefit giving them a guaranteed weekly food package for there household
attributes.background: because of the recent panic buying we are seeing supermarkets stripped of food supplies it would be helpful if the army could help with food delivery so everyone can be assured they will receive the food they require following the covid virus outbreak.

rejection.details: Since you started this e-petition, the army are undertaking actions including food delivery.
